zhcn_desc: §E§H凝聚力§!（£unity£）可以用来解锁新的§H传统§!，雇佣§H领袖§!，颁布§H法令§!。你可以建设建筑提高凝聚力产出： £building£ §H先驱者纪念碑§!或其他可以提供工作岗位以提升凝聚力产出的建筑。§!
en_desc: §E§HUnity§! (£unity£) is used to unlock new §HTraditions§!, recruit §HLeaders§! and enact §HEdicts§!. We can increase our output by building an £building£ §HAutochthon Monument§! or other buildings that provide jobs which produce Unity.§!
